question: i suffer from urine drops falling all the time..for that purpose i use a cloth to clear the drops before wudhu...have been doing this since long....the question is...will my clothes be clean?
answer:
QUESTION
i suffer from urine drops falling all the time..for that purpose i use a cloth to clear the drops before wudhu...have been doing this since long....the question is...will my clothes be clean? as in i use the same cloth for 10 days...its has many drops of urine on it (obviously it has dried up from previous wipe every time i use it again) ..will i have to repeat all prayers? i think this cloth is napaak (even tough it is dry)
ANSWER


Share:
You should ascertain whether you fall in the category of a Ma?zoor or not. For that, kindly refer ?Rules Pertaining to the Ma?zur? ? attached.

If you are a Ma?zoor, then there is no need for you to wipe the urine drops. If you are not a Ma?zoor, then you should not have the cloth on while performing Salaat.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
